name: ARPG Core Ships Update
description:
Alien RPG Core Rules Starships Update
This will import all New Starship Actors and Starship Items into your world and organise them into folders

Published by: Free League Publishing
Foundry Visualisation by Paul Watson
Thanks for their help and support to: Thomas Boulton and Frank Graeff
